tool_description: Finage is a financial data provider company. You can request over 700+ symbols included currencies, metals, stocks, and cryptocurrencies. You can call the last prices, convert currencies between each other and get the historical data.
name: Finage Currency Data Feed
title: Finage Currency Data Feed

api_list.name: Get Currency Last Price
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://finage-currency-data-feed.p.rapidapi.com/last?currencies=USDGBP&apikey=API_KEYUX0RG2F4BXCV5JJ50P0K3BLFQOS0Q0DP"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "finage-currency-data-feed.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Convert Currencies Last Price
api_list.description: Convert any two currencies  Last Price
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://finage-currency-data-feed.p.rapidapi.com/convert?from=BTC&to=USD&amount=2&apikey=API_KEYUX0RG2F4BXCV5JJ50P0K3BLFQOS0Q0DP"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "finage-currency-data-feed.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Currency Historical Price
api_list.description: Request any Currency Historical Last Price
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://finage-currency-data-feed.p.rapidapi.com/history?currency=EURUSD&from=2015-01-05&to=2015-01-07&apikey=API_KEYUX0RG2F4BXCV5JJ50P0K3BLFQOS0Q0DP"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "finage-currency-data-feed.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
